problems.title: Frequency of Each Element in an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers, print the frequency of each distinct element in the order of their first occurrence.

Input Format
First line contains integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
For each distinct element in the order of its first appearance, print the element followed by its frequency in separate lines.

Example 1
Input:
8
4 4 2 1 2 4 3 3

Output:
4 3
2 2
1 1
3 2

Example 2
Input:
6
1 1 1 1 1 1

Output:
1 6

hintsList: Use a data structure that maintains insertion order (like LinkedHashMap, OrderedDict, or vector + map)
First occurrence order matters — not sorted order

problems.title: Count Distinct Elements in an Array
problems.description:
Problem Statement
Given an array of N integers, return the number of distinct (unique) elements present in it.

Input Format
First line contains integer N.
Second line contains N space-separated integers.

Output Format
Print a single integer — the count of distinct elements.

Example 1
Input:
6
1 2 2 1 3 3

Output:
3

Example 2
Input:
5
7 7 7 7 7

Output:
1
